brief: Johaug opens Norway's gold chase in women's 10km classic this morning
Arsenal six points clear at the top, Liverpool chase at Sunderland tonight
Boe brothers and Granerud headline packed Norwegian Olympic schedule ahead

radar: Hovland tees off Sunday morning at Pebble Beach Pro-Am, one of the PGA Tour's most scenic stops on the California coast.
Biathlon relay on Monday sees the Boe brothers anchor Norway's gold favorites, while Tuesday's slalom pits Kristoffersen against Brazil's Braathen in Olympic drama.
Premier League title race tightens as Arsenal's six-point cushion faces midweek tests from Brentford and chasing Manchester City.
